definition[0]: a high rank in the British police, or someone who has this rank
definition[1]: someone who is in charge of all the schools in a particular area in the US
definition[2]: someone who is officially in charge of a place, job, activity etc
example[1]: the superintendent of the Methodist Church in Hawaii
definition[3]: someone who is in charge of an apartment building and is responsible for making repairs in it
definition[4]: someone who is officially in charge of a place or area of work
example[2]: Things got worse when the superintendent left to start a competing business.
